ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore Jail
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Kit, I remember a long time ago (6 months or so ago) that when I wandered into the jail, the 2 mobs on the left seemed to be able to run out, and just
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Kit, I remember a long time ago (6 months or so ago) that when I
wandered into the jail, the 2 mobs on the left seemed to be able to run
out, and just the 1 on the right was chained. I admit I was surprised
recently when I found all 3 of them chained. I was trying to find the board
where someone posted that all 3 couldn't move. All jail hunters I know on
Bertox already knew this and were blasting away at the cornered mobs. As a
matter of fact, 1 warrior who I was teamed with wanted me to ensure that 2
melee mobs were left before I left, so that he could just fight the 1 spawn
in the cell by himself.

I haven't stopped by there recently, let me know when was the last time you
were through there and what server you were on, maybe that makes the
difference?

---Windleaf

At 01:30 PM 10/5/00 -0600, you wrote:
>Stuff in the cells are chained? They sure didn't have any trouble chasing
>me halfway to the zone before I outran them. I hope you were kidding.
>
> Kit
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
